There is no need to use the Cracked file "amtlib.dll" of this torrent. Use the original un-cracked "amtlib.dll" file. If you use the cracked "amtlib.dll" the software will not open at all. To block Adobe Acrobat activation validation, please add the following to "HOST" file located at "C:WINDOWSsystem32driversetc" folder. Open the Host file with Notepad and add these lines to it, otherwise your Serial Number will be revoked / blocked. After opening the Adobe Acrobat XI Pro, go to Edit-->Preference-->Updater, and select "Do not download or install updates automatically":-

127.0.0.1 lmlicenses.wip4.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 lm.licenses.adobe.com

Enjoy....

@Graymalkin27

1. After downloading this torrent install Adobe Acrobat XI Pro as TRIAL version
2. Open Adobe Acrobat XI Pro for a while then close it.
3. Go to C:Windows-System32-drivers-etc then copy hosts to the DESKTOP then open it with notepad and add these lines:
127.0.0.1 activate.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 lmlicenses.wip4.adobe.com
127.0.0.1 lm.licenses.adobe.com
then SAVE.. after that CUT the new hosts and replace it with the one in the drivers-etc..
4. Go to C:Program Files-AdobeAcrobat 11.0-Acrobat and rename the amtlkib.dll to amtlkib.old
5. copy the 'cracked' amtlkib.dll to the location
6. OMG ITS WORKING!! -___-
